  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addNewRequest​(Request newRequest)
    add a new request to the shortest path graph, then change the route so that the pickup and delivery points of the new request are visited last, before returning to the depot
    void addRequestToIndex​(Request request, int indexPickup, int indexDelivery)
    add a request to the shortest path graph, then change the route so that the pickup and delivery points of the request are visited at indexPickup and indexDelivery respectively
    void changeVisitPointOrder​(VisitPoint visitPoint, int newIndex)
    change the order of the VisitPoint visitPoint in the Route to index index
    java.util.List<Path> getPaths()  
    java.util.List<Segment> getRoads()  
    Route getRoute()  
    java.lang.Integer getSolution​(int i)  
    double getSolutionCost()  
    VisitPoint getVisitPoint​(int i)  
    int getVisitPointIndex​(VisitPoint visitPoint)
    get the index of when the visit point is visited
    void removeRequest​(Request requestToRemove)
    remove a request from the route and graph, then connect the missing points together
    void searchSolution​(int timeLimit, Graph g)
    Search for a shortest cost hamiltonian circuit in g within timeLimit milliseconds (returns the best found tour whenever the time limit is reached) Warning: The computed tour always start from vertex 0

      public void searchSolution​(int timeLimit, Graph g)
      Description copied from interface: TSP
      Search for a shortest cost hamiltonian circuit in g within timeLimit milliseconds (returns the best found tour whenever the time limit is reached) Warning: The computed tour always start from vertex 0
      Specified by:
      searchSolution in interface TSP
      Parameters:
      timeLimit - the time limit
      g - the graph being used

    • getSolution

      public java.lang.Integer getSolution​(int i)
      Specified by:
      getSolution in interface TSP
      Parameters:
      i - the index
      Returns:
      the ith visited vertex in the solution computed by searchSolution (-1 if searchSolution has not been called yet, or if i < 0 or i >= g.getNbSommets())

    • getSolutionCost

      public double getSolutionCost()
      Specified by:
      getSolutionCost in interface TSP
      Returns:
      the total cost of the solution computed by searchSolution (-1 if searchSolution has not been called yet).

    • addRequestToIndex

      public void addRequestToIndex​(Request request, int indexPickup, int indexDelivery)
      Description copied from interface: TSP
      add a request to the shortest path graph, then change the route so that the pickup and delivery points of the request are visited at indexPickup and indexDelivery respectively
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      request - the new request to be added
      indexPickup - the index at which the pickup point is visited
      indexDelivery - the index at which the delivery point is visited

    • removeRequest

      public void removeRequest​(Request requestToRemove)
      Description copied from interface: TSP
      remove a request from the route and graph, then connect the missing points together
      Specified by:
      removeRequest in interface TSP
      Parameters:
      requestToRemove - is the request to be removed from the RequestList. Will do nothing if request is not present in the RequestList.

    • changeVisitPointOrder

      public void changeVisitPointOrder​(VisitPoint visitPoint, int newIndex)
      Description copied from interface: TSP
      change the order of the VisitPoint visitPoint in the Route to index index
      Specified by:
      changeVisitPointOrder in interface TSP
      Parameters:
      visitPoint - the concerned VisitPoint, and should be present in the Route
      newIndex - the new visiting order for the visitPoint, and should be a positive number or equal to the total number of VisitPoint
